speaker: Noel assurity
title: Announcing Microsoft AI for Accessibility
description:
This week we want to focus on sharing an exciting new program we recently announced call AI for Accessibility. If you are building a solution for this community, there is now a unique opportunity to get help, Azure services or funding to support your work! What a great time to be in AI!
Resources:
http://microsoft.com/aiforaccessibility
https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/accessibility/2018/10/04/announcing-the-first-ai-for-accessibility-grantee-zyrobotics/
